channel.description: Recent content in modules on Stencil

item.title: Stencil Modules
item.description: Stencil Modules are the core building blocks in Stencil. Modules are used to create reusable grouping of templates and native extensions to be used by stencil. Stencil Modules are powered by Go Modules and must be within a git repository. For more information about Go Modules, see: https://github.com/golang/go/wiki/Modules https://blog.golang.org/using-go-modules Types of Modules There are two types of module usable by stencil, a module and a native extension. A module may, itself, be only one of these types of modules.
